title: Essential Guide to Treat Diabetes and to Lower Cholesterol
description: In this incredibly helpful and concise book, Howard T. Joe describes a common natural food method to treat (pre)diabetes with and without medication and to lower cholesterol without medication. Using this method, he personally reduced his pre-diabetics fasting blood glucose to a good, healthy range of 90s and 100s without medication and his total fasting cholesterol from 210s to 159 and 160s. If you're looking for a natural, easy way to get healthy, Essential Guide to Treat Diabetes and to Lower Cholesterol is for you.
author: Howard T. Joe
